Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
The above named person has applied to register with Supply Desk to work as a (job title) and has given your name as a referee.
We undertake strict vetting checks in respect of all candidates who register with us, before we offer them work. Your response is an integral part of these procedures.
We would be grateful if you would complete the attached reference form and return it to us as soon as possible either by fax (0114 257 2740) or email (complianceteam@supplydesk.co.uk).
If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to call us.
Thank you in advance for your co-operation.
Yours sincerely
The Compliance Team Supply Desk Tel No: 0114 257 2716 Email: complianceteam@supplydesk.co.uk
